nodes.documentation: A proxy Smart Contract following ERC897. Delegate calls to a target contract accessible via implementation()
nodes.name: Proxy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the target address where the calls will be delegated. 
@param _account Target address, that will be accesible via implementation()
nodes.name: setContractLogic

nodes.documentation: @dev ERC897, whether it is a forwarding (1) or an upgradeable (2) proxy
nodes.name: proxyType

nodes.documentation: @dev ERC897, the address the proxy would delegate calls to
nodes.name: implementation

nodes.documentation: @dev Proxy function. Delegate calls to the address taken on implementation()
